phrs.translation: n. 两年制专科学校，大专
超级少年（韩国超人气组合）
初级人员；资历较浅的员工；基层员工
n. 低级文员，低级职员
初级会计师；助理会计员

sentences.sentence: She has coached many of our leading juniors.
sentences.translation: 她训练过我们许多名列前茅的青少年运动员。

sentences.sentence: He has said legal aid work is for juniors when they start out in the law.
sentences.translation: 他曾说过，法律援助工作适合初涉法律工作的低级别律师来做。

sentences.sentence: Dunwell has begun bringing high school juniors to the factory so they can get exposed to its culture.
sentences.translation: 邓维尔已经开始把高中生带到工厂来，这样他们就可以接触到工厂的文化。
